about_the_game:
A farming simulation

Dive into an immersive experience where you can create and develop your own farm while exploring essential aspects of agriculture, construction, management, nature, and economy.

Boundless creativity

Unleash a creativity without limits.
Customize your surroundings, experiment with crop arrangements, and design the farmstead of your dreams

Well managed

Take control of animals and plants that react to each of your decisions. It's up to you to choose whether you prefer to manage the situation as a whole or control your farm down to the smallest details. Expand your farm by conducting research and sell your products to the highest bidder.

Experience the Seasons

Witness the cyclical nature of farming as the seasons change. Adapt your strategies to the weather, ensuring bountiful harvests in the warmth of summer and preparing for the challenges of winter. Nature is both a friend and a foe – be prepared to face its unpredictable whims.

Flourish with Research and Trade

Expand your agricultural prowess by investing in research. Unlock new technologies, discover efficient farming methods, and enhance your produce's quality. As your farm flourishes, open avenues for trade with neighboring communities. Auction your products to the highest bidder and watch your profits soar. Manage your resources wisely, for in this vibrant economy, strategic decisions pave the way to prosperity.

Employees on the Farm

In a farm, hiring employees is essential for smooth operations beyond just agricultural tasks. Skilled workers can handle various responsibilities, from cultivating crops and tending to animals to maintaining equipment. With a dedicated team, workload is efficiently distributed, allowing the farm owner to focus on strategic decisions and overall development. By integrating competent employees, the farm can thrive, maximizing productivity and ensuring seamless day-to-day operations.
